author: Diana Arguinzoni

review: I bought the Amazin Fire Stick after reading some great reviews. I have been a roku and chromecast user for a while and needed something to replace my aging roku. I did not want another chromecast as I really wanted access to watch prime movies on the device and wanted to try something other than roku. I received my Amazon Fire stick today and set it up once I got home. I was shocked to find myself blocked out of HBOGo and many other apps that are available for chromecast and roku are not available. I am disappointed to see that Amazon pushes its own content so aggressively that I have to look at their offering on the main screen. I also think the navigation is a bit lousy. The only good thing I can see so far is the processor is quite fast and the remote works nicely... Other than these two positives the Fire Tv is a crappy comparison to roku, Apple TV and chromecast.
author: PCS

review: We bought this about 2-3 months ago. Worked great at first...then, about 3 weeks ago, Hulu stopped working properly. We looked online, followed forum advice, did the troubleshooting, etc., and couldn't find a fix that lasted more than a day. This is not a problem Hulu (which, admittedly, has its own issues), as we're still able to use Hulu via laptop.Now, today, Netflix isn't working on the Fire stick, either. Just checked the Amazon user forum and it looks like this is a common problem without a real solution. Most people said they had to call Amazon customer service and argue with them until they sent a replacement. Frankly, I'm not up for this, especially for a product that seems to have multiple problems.Overall, the Amazon Fire stick is a great concept, but the execution is pretty poor.
author: E. Throesch

review: We did not want to purchase a video game console or HDMI monster cable to enjoy Prime streaming. Fire TV Stick went beyond my expectations! Very easy to setup up and use with the remote. I'm finally getting use of my Prime Account without the hassle of getting out the laptop and having the convenience of viewing on a large TV monitor for "family/friend movie night". I'm discovering new series to fall in love with every time I use it, like the Veggie Tales series for my little preschooler. Love that I can download apps to enhance the experience, for example I synced my Fire TV stick with my HBO Go account. Lastly, you can't beat the price!
author: GloryB

review: Didn't pick up wifi worth a damn.  Amazon sent me a replacement, but it had the same issue.  Was less than 15 feet from router and was told these require a VERY strong signal.
